name: initialize_note
attributes: # [doc = " ノート初期化：PDA で生成し、所有者と内容を保存"]
body: let note = & mut ctx . accounts . note ;
note . owner = ctx . accounts . user . key () ;

name: update_content
attributes: # [doc = " ノート更新：has_one と signer で所有者を検証"]
body: let note = & mut ctx . accounts . note ;

fields.name: note
fields.attribute: # [doc = " PDA で生成するノートアカウント"] # [account (init , payer = user , space = 8 + 32 + 1 + 4 + 256 , seeds = [b"note" , user . key () . as_ref ()] , bump)]

fields.name: user
fields.attribute: # [doc = " トランザクション送信者（オーナー）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: note
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 既存のノート（PDA seeds＋bump、has_one=owner）"] # [account (mut , seeds = [b"note" , owner . key () . as_ref ()] , bump = note . bump , has_one = owner)]

fields.name: owner
fields.attribute: # [doc = " ノート所有者（署名必須）"] # [account (signer)]
